name: Dark Crusader's Challenge
description: Interact with Exacter Dunmire at Skyrest for the first time.

name: Putrid Mother's Embrace
description: Interact with the Shrine of the Putrid Mother next to Molhu at Skyrest for the first time.

name: Orian Vow Of Protection
description: Interact with the Shrine of Orius next to Nathaniel at Skyrest for the first time.

name: Common Orian Prayer
description: Once you've beaten Scourged Sister Delyth, head to Pilgrim's Perch. Climb a ladder, move ahead, and you'll spot another ladder. Go up that one too. At the top, step into the Umbral realm. Use Soulflay on the platform to make it to the other side.

name: Beckoning
description: Interact with Thehk-Ihir outside Skyrest for the first time.

name: Crimson Ritual Fervou
description: Reach the Shrine of Adyr and interact with it for the first time.

name: Pledge To Adyr
description: From Upper Calrath Mining District/Vestige of Doln, continue forward until you reach the outside of the alley. Descend to the lower level, and you'll discover loot near some wooden sticks, close to a spellcaster enemy. Collect it to obtain the gesture.

name: Halting
description: During your journey in the Fief of the Chill Curse, you'll explore an ice cave. About halfway through the cave, you'll discover a loot that contains the gesture.

name: Hallowed Sentinel
description: Just before you reach the spot where you meet Stomund at the Abbey of the Hallowed Sisters, there's an area with a tree in the center. At the base of the tree, you can find the loot holding the gesture.

name: Calrath Noble's Bow
description: Interact with the Tortured Prisoner at the entrance of the Pieta boss arena in Skyrest.

name: Bemoaning
description: Interact with Byron at Sunless Skein Hoist/Vestige of Catrin.

name: Celebration
description: Interact with Winterberry at Revelation Depths.

name: Surrender
description: To achieve this, you must progress through the Iron Wayfarer quest.

name: Wheezing
description: You need to progress through Drustan quest to achieve this.

name: Laughter
description: You need to follow Damarose the Marked quest to get this gesture.
